医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 封锁减少了儿童喘息和细支气管炎病例在 COVID-19 封锁期间，细支气管炎病例显着下降，从而减少了儿童喘息发作和呼吸道药物的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/COVID-19-lockdown-reduced-childhood-wheezing-and-bronchiolitis-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/COVID-19-lockdown-reduced-childhood-wheezing-and-bronchiolitis-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b665e7e0-6a0f-4f33-b40c-ca6ca4a49c5f Wed, 10 Jul 2024 23:00:00 -0400 COVID-19 lockdown reduced childhood wheezing and bronchiolitis cases
糖耐量受损诊断后四年非糖尿病状态可降低心血管风险糖耐量受损诊断后至少维持非糖尿病状态四年可显着降低心血管并发症和死亡率的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Four-years-non-diabetic-status-after-impaired-glucose-tolerance-diagnosis-cuts-cardioangio-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Four-years-non-diabetic-status-after-impaired-glucose-tolerance-diagnosis-cuts-cardioangio-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62939b74-f57b-4407-aa66-c61a2f657a10 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 22:42:00 -0400 Four years non-diabetic status after impaired glucose tolerance diagnosis cuts cardiovascular risks
沙拉受到审查：研究揭示了即食沙拉的污染风险和解决方案该研究论文强调了即食沙拉生产中的关键污染点，并讨论了确保微生物安全和健康的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Salads-under-scrutiny-Study-reveals-contamination-risks-and-solutions-in-ready-to-eat-salads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Salads-under-scrutiny-Study-reveals-contamination-risks-and-solutions-in-ready-to-eat-salads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d3feabf-ac3c-4b71-994b-6dd966f9838e Wed, 10 Jul 2024 21:21:00 -0400 Salads under scrutiny: Study reveals contamination risks and solutions in ready-to-eat salads
新分子可以为中风相关脑损伤的新疗法提供信息病童医院 (SickKids) 的科学家发现，一种新开发的分子 LK-2 可以为中风相关脑损伤提供新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-molecule-could-inform-new-therapies-for-中风-相关-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-molecule-could-inform-new-therapies-for-中风-相关-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=544bbc9d-96ee-4a51-b533-273eb5cb8ff6 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:34:44 -0400 Novel molecule could inform new therapies for stroke-related brain injury
新联盟获得美国国立卫生研究院拨款，加速开发有效的结核病治疗方法由威尔康奈尔医学公司共同领导的一个新财团已获得美国国立卫生研究院国家过敏和传染病研究所提供的为期五年、价值 3100 万美元的资助，以加速开发更快、更有效的结核病 (TB) 治疗方案）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-consortium-receives-NIH-grant-to-accelerate-development-of- effective-TB-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-consortium-receives-NIH-grant-to-accelerate-development-of- effective-TB-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ba5b168-6456-488e-b094-01341fc805d7 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:30:40 -0400 New consortium receives NIH grant to accelerate development of effective TB treatments
重新利用 Pemafibrate 治疗与代谢紊乱相关的肝病巴塞罗那大学领导的一项研究建议使用称为 pemafibrate 的药物来治疗与代谢紊乱相关的肝病，代谢紊乱是世界上最常见的肝脏病理学，影响四分之一的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Repurifying-pemafibrate-to-treat-liver-disease-linked-with-metabolic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Repurifying-pemafibrate-to-treat-liver-disease-linked-with-metabolic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a8d67e9-37fc-4e22-b95e-b51fca62e1da Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:20:00 -0400 Repurposing pemafibrate to treat liver disease associated with metabolic disorders
抗体片段的发现可能会导致轻链淀粉样变性急需的治疗在患有一种称为轻链淀粉样变性的罕见疾病的人中，轻链蛋白（抗体的组成部分）会突变并在不同的器官中积聚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antibody-fragment-discovery-could-lead-to-much-needed-treatment-for-light-chain-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antibody-fragment-discovery-could-lead-to-much-needed-treatment-for-light-chain-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bde54d27-d057-4377-b872-c75f0cfb5f3f Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:14:13 -0400 Antibody fragment discovery could lead to much-needed treatment for light chain amyloidosis
研究表明，长期接触空气污染物可能会增加狼疮风险发表在《关节炎与风湿病学》上的新研究表明，长期接触空气污染物可能会增加患狼疮的风险，狼疮是一种影响多个器官的自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Chronic-exposure-to-air-pollutants-may-increase-lupus-risk-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Chronic-exposure-to-air-pollutants-may-increase-lupus-risk-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=096d14b3-0d01-44ad-bdf8-709569c1d8ea Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:07:54 -0400 Chronic exposure to air pollutants may increase lupus risk, research shows
通过地中海饮食和 omega-3 补充剂改善痤疮症状《美容皮肤病学杂志》上的一项研究纳入了 60 名患有轻度至中度痤疮的个体，遵循地中海饮食并服用 omega-3 脂肪酸补充剂可显着减少炎症和非炎症性皮肤病变，并提高皮肤质量。生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Improving-acne-symptoms-with-Mediterranean-diet-and-omega-3-supplements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Improving-acne-symptoms-with-Mediterranean-diet-and-omega-3-supplements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe5404f0-0e1a-492c-901e-7981300817fd Wed, 10 Jul 2024 15:03:05 -0400 Improving acne symptoms with Mediterranean diet and omega-3 supplements
研究人员发现日本嗜酸细胞性食管炎的发病率和患病率在日本首批此类研究之一中，大阪都立大学领导的研究人员发现了慢性过敏性疾病嗜酸性粒细胞性食管炎（EoE）的发病率和患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Researchers-uncover-the-incidence-and-prevalence-of-eosinophilic-esophagitis-in-Japan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Researchers-uncover-the-incidence-and-prevalence-of-eosinophilic-esophagitis-in-Japan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58daa64d-9c3d-45c6-a6ad-1dabe58218c9 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 14:55:56 -0400 Researchers uncover the incidence and prevalence of eosinophilic esophagitis in Japan
